name: This Is Not A Photo Opportunity (2007) by Banksy
description: This is an example of Banksy's vandalized oil paintings, a renowned series. It sold for $385k in 2008, $2.6M in 2022, and later for a private acquisition price.

name: Raincoat Triptych (1982) by Alex Katz
description: Alex Katz's Raincoat Triptych (1982) is part of his recent market surge, with works like this making up six of his top ten auction records since 2019.

name: Orator (2010) by Lynette Yiadom-Boakye
description: Yiadom-Boakye has seen seven straight years of turnover growth at auction, going from $1.7M in ‘18 to $10M in ‘24.

name: Untitled (2007) by Günther Förg
description: Seven of Günther Förg’s top ten auction records are Spot Paintings, making them his most sought-after series.
